description: The name speaks for itself: The Ultimate Comfort outdoor jacket is designed for maximum comfort. Perfect for hiking and other outdoor adventures as well as travel or everyday wear. The polyamide exterior provides durability, and the 4-way stretch material and smooth partial-wool lining feel extra comfortable on the skin. The Ultimate Comfort protects you from the wind while the PFC-free water-repellant treatment keeps you dry in the occasional rain shower. Plenty of practical features ensure the Ultimate Comfort is a jacket you can rely on when you’re being active outdoors. A comfortable softshell jacket that offers you protection from wind and harsh weather all year round.
name: Mammut Ultimate Comfort SO Hooded Jacket - Mens
